price: [Los ángeles dicen:] "No hay entre nosotros quien no tenga un lugar asignado,
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
